h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location
content: Buddha's Right Hand is a mandatory boss during the chapter, so you can't miss them. However, Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is completely optional, found by the Lower Hollow Shrine. Our walkthrough of the Lower Hollow will take you through how you can find him from the boss fight with the Buddha's Right Hand.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Immortal_Blessing_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Immortal Blessing Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Immortal Blessing Gourd location'.
The content is as follows:
Buddha's Right Hand is a mandatory boss during the chapter, so you can't miss them. However, Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw is completely optional, found by the Lower Hollow Shrine. Our walkthrough of the Lower Hollow will take you through how you can find him from the boss fight with the Buddha's Right Hand.
